Class Commission

java.lang.Object
Homework9.Hourly
Homework9.Commission
public class Commission extends Hourly
Commission extends Hourly and represents a commissioned employee who receives both hourly pay and sales commission.

  • Constructor Details

    • Commission

      public Commission(String name, String address, String phone, String socialSecurityNumber, double hourlyRate, double commissionRate)
      Constructs a new Commission employee with the specified information.
      Parameters:
      name - The employee's full name
      address - The employee's address
      phone - The employee's phone number
      socialSecurityNumber - The employee's social security number
      hourlyRate - The employee's hourly pay rate
      commissionRate - The employee's commission rate as a decimal

  • Method Details

    • addSales

      public void addSales(double sales)
      Adds the specified sales amount to the employee's total sales.
      Parameters:
      sales - The sales amount to add

    • pay

      public double pay()
      Calculates and returns the employee's total pay including both hourly pay and commission. Resets both hours worked and total sales after calculating pay.
      Overrides:
      pay in class Hourly
      Returns:
      The total pay including hourly wages and sales commission

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the commissioned employee.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Hourly
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing all employee information including sales
